data.text: @FlightEx_YT Thanks for the great review, and happy you've enjoyed flying with us 😊

data.text: Developed by art collective @Sbagliato, the second edition of #ItalianGateways comes to #Frankfurt, bringing a taste of Italy to the appropriately named gateway to Germany. Have you visited any of these wonderful cities? #AirDolomiti @thetripmagazine #urbanart https://t.co/YSEfTu6hDe

A scenic ride on #tram19 is a great way to start your holiday in #Munich. The #AlternativeGuide will lead you to the Maximilianeum parliament, which takes on a gorgeous gold tinge at sunset. 
1. Justizpalast
2. Maximilianstraße
3. Maximilianeum
https://t.co/GEEspddJNb https://t.co/ue3c9epTPr
RT @journalffm: In Zusammenarbeit mit @Air_Dolomiti hat das Künstlertrio #Sbagliato in #Frankfurt die Tore nach #Italien geöffnet: An drei…
@KlemenPetek Dear Klement, can you please send us via DM booking code and real passenger name? So we can help you further. Pls do it via DM due to privacy 😊
@buns64 Merci beaucoup! Really appreciate your words, and happy you enjoyed your experience with us. https://t.co/9UQk5h4ywM

*** STRIKE IN ITALY ***

In the expectation of a strike action in Italy, affecting ground services Friday, Oct 25th: check your flight status by contacting our Sales Center +39 045 288 6140 (Mon-Fri 8.30 - 8pm, Sat-Sun 9am - 5pm) or theLufthansa Customer Service: 899 198 000
@SnivyA https://t.co/amlgX2lW2w
What's going on in #Frankfurt? The city will be peeking through some of Italy's most beautiful gateways... Keep following us! #AirDolomiti #ItalianGateways https://t.co/Ks8tSfYszj
@ccstorytime Good morning dear Chloè, check your DM, all details there 😊
@GachetChristop2 We try to do our best 🤓 https://t.co/uFNeHW87IQ
@erica_fiorini @FPRConlus https://t.co/cgglJMVOmN
@louder_thinking Vielen Dank!Haben Sie es schon mit Chrome versucht? Sie können uns eventuell all Details per DM schicken und wir helfen Ihnen weiter.
@louder_thinking Guten morgen lieber Think, es tut uns sehr leid. Wir haben die Anomalie schon gemeldet. Mit welchem Browser haben sie es probiert? MFG/Laure

A good reason to plan a trip to #Turin in the next weeks? For all the food lovers out there, the White Truffle International Fair!

For this occasion a direct 🚌 is available.
Further information 👉 https://t.co/R9L7xHmYOw https://t.co/0rFeVuZG1E

Se amate la #StreetArt art non potrete non innamorarvi di #Monaco di Baviera. Lasciate che le strade siano la vostra galleria e scoprirete un nuovo lato di questa incredibile città grazie a @travelonart. Buona lettura! #AirDolomitiBlog https://t.co/n0NqjM33gk

data.text: @herrkohler Good morning dear Karsten, we are terrible sorry and do really apologize. Our customer relations dpt is currently facing a high volume of incoming requests. Have forwarded to them everything and sure they will get back to you asap. BR/Laure
@cristhin82 Dear Cristhin, we are really terrible sorry for the situation! And do totally relate. Could you please send us via DM the reference number of Lost&Found? Br/Laure
@Air_Dolomiti So happy for you 😍

Even more beautiful, even faster, even more "alternative"! We've revamped the look of #AlternativeGuide, our guide written for discerning travellers. Check it out on #AirDolomitiBlog! https://t.co/wTJhfEZSXv
@8thomasgriffin Thanks 😊 BR/Laure
@8thomasgriffin Terribly sorry, Thomas. Could you kindly send us via DM (as sensitive data) real name and bookig code and/or ticket number. BR/Laure

@8thomasgriffin Hi Thomas,

we are truly sorry to hear this. Would you please provide us with your request's ref. number (starting with T and ending with S) so we can forward it to our Customer Relations Department?

Thanks for your comprehension and patience.

Kind regards

@MSavinaSeverino @lufthansa We truly thank you for your feedback. It’s never too late to embrace change! We’ve double-checked w the Head of the dpt in charge and, from now on, it will be possible to serve our hot beverages in the passenger’s personal cup upon request. We are always happy to listen to you!

data.text: @MSavinaSeverino Many thanks! We are here to always improve our services. Answer via DM sent. BR/Laure
@Tomislav_Pusic https://t.co/MLSaClvQJT

@MSavinaSeverino Dear Mrs Severino, we are terribly sorry and can relate. It will be our personal intention to go deeper and report everything to the cabin crew dpt. Would you kindly send us via DM, as sensitive data, flight number and date? BR/Laure
@GisbertBrunner Hope you had an amazing flight ✈️ and all the best to your fantastic grandson 🎂🎈
@janeee63 Good morning dear Jane, we are terribly sorry. Could you please DM us (as sensitive data) details such as real name, flight number and reservation code? BR/Laure

urls.title: Flights to Italy and Germany: Discover Europe | Air Dolomiti
urls.description: Fly to Germany and Italy with Air Dolomiti: discover all the connections and reach the main European destinations easily with our best fares.

data.text: @rudi_kloss Dear Rudirudirudi, could you please send us bokking code, via DM as sensitive data? Many thank/Laure

@herrkohler Dear Karsten, we are really sorry and totally understand your point. We have forwarded your feedback to our customer relations dpt. As they are facing  a high volume of incoming requests they will get back to you as soon as possible. Should you be needing anything els
@hodgkss Dear Mrs Hodgkiss, our colleagues got back to you on August the 12th, just let me know in case you didn't receive the mail and we will re-send it asap. BR/Laure

🚗🏎️🚙 Sei un appassionato d'auto e non vuoi perderti anteprime esclusive? Allora non puoi mancare al #SalonedellAutodiFrancoforte 🚗🏎️🚙https://t.co/lEjE4xAEMv #germany #saloneautofrancoforte #voliperfrancoforte✈️

@SnarkHunt2000 @torinoairport Hi Bruce! Thanks for contacting us here. We truly apologize for any inconveniences we may have caused and would be happy to help. Could you be so kind to send us via DM your booking reference (ticket number or PNR)? BR/Michaela
Congratulations @embraer! 🎉🍾 https://t.co/OUbNcjPfHo
Only got two days to visit #Verona? We've got some great ideas on what to see in our best bits: https://t.co/USGR10HAXU #AlternativeGuide https://t.co/R8sA5tP8sH
RT @AirbourneColour: We are delighted to continue the re-paint of @Air_Dolomiti fleet of Embraer 195 into their new scheme. This time I-ADJ…
@jayhawknj Just replyed to your DM. Thanks for contacting us here! BR/Michaela
@jayhawknj Done! ;)
@CICG Exactly! Please send me your PRN by DM and I'll send you the link to process the payment. Looking forward to hearing from you soon, Michaela
@saxena_Him Thank you so much for the suggestion! I'll forward it to the department in charge. I wish you a lovely day! BR/Michaela
@UyQmnGWTdlc0B7h Hi! How can we help you? BR/Michaela
@cheerna_ Hi! We'll be happy to help if you could send us your PNR and all the details via DM. BR/Michaela
@saxena_Him We truly apologize for any inconvenience and dissatisfaction, but when technology doesn't collaborate, the only possible solution is to check-in at the airport. BR/Michaela
RT @MeindlFCB: Gli antichi greci amavano construire i propri edifici in punti panoramici: per il teatro di Taormina affacciato sull‘Etna e…
@hodgkss Hi! I've double checked with the dpt in charge and they confirmed they sent you a reply on Aug 12th. Should you need any further info, please feel free to contact us anytime. BR/Michaela
